title: SOLD: T205 Broad Leaf, miscut back
author: Rob D.

posts.post_title: SOLD: T205 Broad Leaf, miscut back
posts.post_content:
Rather than tell you how incredibly rare a T205 with a Broad Leaf back is, or how T205s with miscut backs aren't understood by collectors and are woefully underpriced :eek::eek::eek:, or how SGC was shockingly harsh when assigning grades and these cards easily are candidates for a one-grade -- heck, make it a two-grade! -- bump, I think I'll just provide scans, prices and payment information.

I also will choose to not insult your intelligence by pricing these for hundreds of dollars more than I can expect to sell them for, then bump the thread every few days with a "price reduction."

I am thanking you now for the numerous emails I will receive on these (which means I won't be bumping the thread tomorrow to thank you for the numerous emails I've received).

Broad Leaf George Bell, SGC 60/5: SOLD

Piedmont Ed Reulbach with miscut reverse, SGC 20/1.5: SOLD

Prices are delivered within the United States.

PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment. (Check, cash, money order also OK and preferred).

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes: 

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions.[/URL]

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol dot com[/URL]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/otherphotos/2-t205s.jpg[/IMG]
Awesome cards, miscut side is chief Meyers fwiw.
